Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe is worth every penny of its $12000 value to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $10800. This is an excellent chance to save $1200 compared to the standard price. Please let me know if you are interested in this offer so we can proceed with the transaction. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,800. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,800
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
